Genji.name: Shuriken
Genji.description: Throw 3 Shuriken in a spread pattern, each dealing 65 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.  Stores up to 3 charges. Shuriken's cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.

Genji.name: Deflect
Genji.description: Become Protected for 1.25 seconds. Any damage blocked during this period causes Genji to throw a Kunai toward the nearest enemy, prioritizing Heroes and dealing 55 (+4% per level) damage.

Genji.name: Swift Strike
Genji.description: Dash forward, dealing 215 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. Enemy Heroes that die within 2 seconds of being hit with Swift Strike cause the cooldown and mana cost to be refunded.

Genji.name: Dragonblade
Genji.description: Unleash the Dragonblade for 8 seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage. If enemy Heroes are killed within 2 seconds of being hit by Dragonblade, Swift Strike's cooldown is reset.

Genji.name: X-Strike
Genji.description: Perform two slashes dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage. The slashes detonate after 1.25 seconds causing an additional 270 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in their area.

Genji.name: Cyber Agility
Genji.description: Activate to jump to the target area.

1.name: Agile Dismount
1.description: While mounted, the range of Cyber Agility is increased by 70% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

1.name: Pathfinder
1.description: Jumping over terrain with Cyber Agility increases Genji's Movement Speed by 25% for 6 seconds.

1.name: Swift as the Wind
1.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Swift Strike increases Genji's Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.

4.name: Dragon Claw
4.description: After Genji blocks 330 (+4% per level) damage with Deflect, activate to release a Dragon Claw, dealing 190 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

4.name: Shuriken Mastery
4.description: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes with Shuriken.  Reward: After hitting 35 Heroes, Shuriken damage is increased by 25.  Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes, Cyber Agility now refunds 2 charges of Shuriken.

4.name: Strike At The Heart
4.description: Enemies hit by the end of Swift Strike take an additional 138 (+4% per level) damage over 2 seconds.

7.name: Augmented Guard
7.description: When Deflect ends, Genji gains a Shield equal to 50% of the damage blocked for 4 seconds.

7.name: Cyber Shield
7.description: Using Cyber Agility grants 50 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Dodge
7.description: Genji dodges 1 Heroic Basic Attack every 8 seconds.

7.name: Perfect Defense
7.description: Deflected damage reduces the cooldown of Deflect by 2 seconds, up to a maximum of 10 seconds.

10.name: Dragonblade
10.description: Unleash the Dragonblade for 8 seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage. If enemy Heroes are killed within 2 seconds of being hit by Dragonblade, Swift Strike's cooldown is reset.

10.name: X-Strike
10.description: Perform two slashes dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage. The slashes detonate after 1.25 seconds causing an additional 270 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in their area.

13.name: Double Jump
13.description: Cyber Agility stores 2 charges but its cooldown is increased by 5 seconds.

13.name: Flow Like Water
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit with Swift Strike reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

13.name: Shingan
13.description: Hitting an enemy with all 3 Shuriken deals 115 (+4% per level) bonus damage.

16.name: Final Cut
16.description: After 1 second, Swift Strike deals an additional 125 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in the area.

16.name: Reflect
16.description: Deflect also deals an additional 33% of the damage blocked.

16.name: Steady Blade
16.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Swift Strike increases the damage of the next Swift Strike by 20%. This bonus stacks up to 3 times.

20.name: Living Weapon
20.description: Each enemy Hero hit by X-Strike reduces its cooldown by 12 seconds.

20.name: Sharpened Stars
20.description: Shuriken now pierce all enemies hit.

20.name: The Dragon Becomes Me
20.description: Each time Dragonblade hits an enemy Hero, the duration of Dragonblade is increased by 1 second.

20.name: Zanshin
20.description: Quest: Block 6500 damage with Deflect, including damage blocked so far.  Reward: Deflect hits all nearby enemy Heroes.
